text: Tseveenravdangiin Byambajav (born 7 July 1990) is a Mongolian long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. In 2017 Byambajav participated in the World Championships held in London, placing 46th in the marathon event, with a time of 2:21:48. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Mongolian male long-distance runners Category:Mongolian male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Olympic athletes of Mongolia Category:Asian Games competitors for Mongolia
title: Tseveenravdangiin Byambajav
